body_html:
I am on a CUDA 10 build but...

import torch
tens = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(547687296).uniform_()
print("This works", tens.sum() )
tens.mul_(2)
print("This also works", tens.sum() )
tens = tens*2
print("This still works", tens.sum() )

yeah you are right. its because i multiplied by 1/2 which does mult by 1 and then div by 2 :P

body:
> I am on a CUDA 10 build but...
> 
> ```python
> import torch
> tens = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(547687296).uniform_()
> print("This works", tens.sum() )
> tens.mul_(2)
> print("This also works", tens.sum() )
> tens = tens*2
> print("This still works", tens.sum() )
> ```

yeah you are right. its because i multiplied by 1/2 which does mult by 1 and then div by 2 :P
